Posts.Content: Mar 29, 2015 01:43PM Mayhem wrote: Glad that your tumour markers are declining, have just seen mine always go up so hoping carboplatin will help. Thanks for your feedback.
Posts.Title: Anybody on carboplatin? Mayhem kebab

Posts.Content: Mayhem wrote: I have had 12 failed sessions of taxol and avastin and 4 cycles of EC chemo. Unfortunately, these have not worked for me - am triple negative and carrying both primary and secondary cancer - bone mets and liver mets. My onc has now put me on carboplatin and was hoping to find someone who may have or is on this and could share their experience of this chemo. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anybody on carboplatin? Mayhem kebab
